competitors.name: Xero
competitors.notes: Major cloud-based accounting competitor, strong international presence

competitors.name: Sage Intacct
competitors.notes: Cloud accounting platform for SMBs and mid-market

competitors.name: FreshBooks
competitors.notes: Cloud accounting for small businesses and freelancers

competitors.name: H&R Block
competitors.notes: Leading tax preparation competitor with retail and online offerings

competitors.name: SAP Business One
competitors.notes: ERP solution for small and medium businesses

competitors.name: Bench
competitors.notes: Bookkeeping and tax filing services for small businesses

context: By 2015, cloud-based accounting software had become mainstream. Intuit's QuickBooks Online was competing against Xero, FreshBooks, and enterprise solutions like NetSuite and Sage Intacct. TurboTax maintained dominance in tax software.
